mapper.select: SELECT * FROM thread a JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT t.thr_key as thr_key FROM thread t JOIN mention m ON m.res_id = #{user_serial} and m.thr_key = t.thr_key) b ON a.thr_key = b.thr_key
SELECT res_id, thr_key, reg_id, reg_dt FROM mention WHERE thr_key = #{thrKey}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mention ( res_id, thr_key, reg_id, reg_dt ) VALUES ( #{resId}, #{thrKey}, #{regId}, SYSDATE )
